changeSet.sql: create or replace procedure insert_entity_keywords(table_name in varchar2, column_name in varchar2, entity_name in varchar2, prop_name in varchar2) AUTHID CURRENT_USER is begin execute immediate ' insert into os_search_entity_keywords(identifier, entity, entity_id, name, value, status) select os_search_entity_keywords_seq.nextval, ''' || entity_name || ''', identifier, ''' || prop_name || ''', lower(' || column_name || '), 1 from ' || table_name || ' where activity_status != ''Disabled'' and ' || column_name || ' is not null'; end; //

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Populate registration eMPI, UID, and MRN search keywords
changeSet.sql: insert into os_search_entity_keywords(entity, entity_id, name, value, status) select 'collection_protocol_registration', r.identifier, 'empi', lower(p.empi_id), 1 from catissue_participant p inner join catissue_coll_prot_reg r on r.participant_id = p.identifier where p.activity_status != 'Disabled' and r.activity_status != 'Disabled' and p.empi_id is not null;

insert into os_search_entity_keywords(entity, entity_id, name, value, status) select 'collection_protocol_registration', r.identifier, 'uid', lower(p.social_security_number), 1 from catissue_participant p inner join catissue_coll_prot_reg r on r.participant_id = p.identifier where p.activity_status != 'Disabled' and r.activity_status != 'Disabled' and p.social_security_number is not null;

insert into os_search_entity_keywords(entity, entity_id, name, value, status) select 'collection_protocol_registration', r.identifier, 'medicalRecordNumber', lower(pmi.medical_record_number), 1 from catissue_part_medical_id pmi inner join catissue_participant p on p.identifier = pmi.participant_id inner join catissue_coll_prot_reg r on r.participant_id = p.identifier where p.activity_status != 'Disabled' and r.activity_status != 'Disabled' and pmi.medical_record_number is not null;
